title: Industrial Rev Black Country Image MCQ 4

content.description:
THE BLACK COUNTRY, ANONYMOUS ENGRAVING DEPICTING THE ENGLISH TOWN OF OLDBURY, CIRCA 1850

Historical Images Archive / Alamy Stock Photo
content.question: Which of the following best explains how the technological processes, reflected in the image, influenced the twentieth-century world?

choices.label: The proliferation of nuclear weapons during the Cold War threatened global destruction.
Increased mobility resulted in the spread of new infectious diseases.
The release of greenhouse gases contributed to debates about the nature of climate change.
New medical advances, such as antibiotics and immunizations, significantly increased the global population.

content.answer: The release of greenhouse gases contributed to debates about the nature of climate change.

topic.text: 9.3: Technological Advances - Debates about the Environment after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
